name: BeeEss Industries
overview:
Bee Ess Industries came into inception as a Partnership firm in Ludhiana, Punjab, India in 1971. The firm is diligently focused under the Brand name Uniform’s INN. We offer a wide range of Customized School Uniforms, Hotel Uniforms, Hospital Uniforms, School Skirts, School Uniform Pants, School Shirts, Tracksuits and Socks.

Our Valued Clientele: Within a small span of time we are able to capture a huge share of business in the market. We are able to keep our clients happy because we are seasoned in understanding their needs and fulfilling the same has earned us good reputation in the market.

Our Quality: Dyeing strength Fabric strength Shrinkage Stitch durability

Our Team: Our entire range of products is manufactured by our workforce who is chosen with care, a due consideration is given to prior experience, education in the field of production and aptitude. We can say proudly our people work with a common goal and there is a spirit of immense team work in the complete unit. We also have very efficient quality controllers who work ceaselessly to ensure achievement of quality production.

Why Us? / Our Strengths: We have been able to successfully establish our name in the market for quality products; we are a brand name in the market for manufacturing elegant and smart dresses. We also have a repute regarding commitment towards meeting bulk demands always on time.
